item.title: HTML - image load error handle
item.description: HTML - image load error handle 2 way Use onerror <img src="<image url>" onerror="this.src='<d4 image url>'" /> Use Magic Image Pseudo Element img.imgd4 { position: relative; display: block; } img.imgd4:after { display: block; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; background: url(<d4 image url>) no-repeat; background-size: contain; width: 100%; height: 100%; content: ''; }
